queries.sql: INSERT INTO `app_settings` (`name`, `value`, `status`) VALUES ('refoundInput', '<p dir=\"ltr\">REFUND AND CANCELLATION POLICY</p> <p dir=\"ltr\">Last Updated: 12 Feb 2026</p> <p dir=\"ltr\">At Robinfood, we take pride in the quality of our products. As a premium health-focused brand by Arrikar Foods, we ensure that every packet leaves our facility in perfect condition.</p> <p dir=\"ltr\">However, we understand that issues can sometimes occur during transit. This Refund and Cancellation Policy outlines your rights and our procedures for such events.</p> <p dir=\"ltr\">1. Cancellation Policy</p> <ul> <li dir=\"ltr\" aria-level=\"1\"> <p dir=\"ltr\" role=\"presentation\">Before Shipment: You may cancel your order if it has not yet been dispatched from our warehouse. To cancel, please email us immediately at info@robinfoodsindia.com or call our customer care number. If the order is cancelled before shipment, a full refund will be initiated.</p> </li> <li dir=\"ltr\" aria-level=\"1\"> <p dir=\"ltr\" role=\"presentation\">After Shipment: Once the order has been dispatched/shipped, it cannot be cancelled.</p> </li> </ul> <p dir=\"ltr\">2. Return Policy (Damaged or Defective Goods)</p> <p dir=\"ltr\">Due to the perishable nature of food products, we do not accept returns for \"change of mind\" or personal preference.</p> <p dir=\"ltr\">We only accept returns or replacements under the following specific conditions:</p> <ul> <li dir=\"ltr\" aria-level=\"1\"> <p dir=\"ltr\" role=\"presentation\">Damaged Product: The package was open, torn, or crushed upon delivery.</p> </li> <li dir=\"ltr\" aria-level=\"1\"> <p dir=\"ltr\" role=\"presentation\">Wrong Item: You received a different product than what you ordered.</p> </li> <li dir=\"ltr\" aria-level=\"1\"> <p dir=\"ltr\" role=\"presentation\">Expired/Spoiled: The product received is past its expiry date or appears spoiled.</p> </li> </ul> <p dir=\"ltr\">How to Report an Issue: You must notify us within 48 hours of receiving the delivery. Please send an email to info@robinfoodsindia.com with:</p> <ol> <li dir=\"ltr\" aria-level=\"1\"> <p dir=\"ltr\" role=\"presentation\">Your Order ID.</p> </li> <li dir=\"ltr\" aria-level=\"1\"> <p dir=\"ltr\" role=\"presentation\">Clear photos/videos of the damaged or wrong product.</p> </li> <li dir=\"ltr\" aria-level=\"1\"> <p dir=\"ltr\" role=\"presentation\">A brief description of the issue.</p> </li> </ol> <p dir=\"ltr\">Note: We reserve the right to reject return claims if the issue is not reported within 48 hours of delivery.</p> <p dir=\"ltr\">3. Refund Policy</p> <p dir=\"ltr\">Once your return/cancellation request is received and inspected:</p> <ul> <li dir=\"ltr\" aria-level=\"1\"> <p dir=\"ltr\" role=\"presentation\">Approval: We will notify you via email regarding the approval or rejection of your refund.</p> </li> <li dir=\"ltr\" aria-level=\"1\"> <p dir=\"ltr\" role=\"presentation\">Processing: If approved, your refund will be processed immediately.</p> </li> <li dir=\"ltr\" aria-level=\"1\"> <p dir=\"ltr\" role=\"presentation\">Timeline: The credit will automatically be applied to your original method of payment (Credit Card, Debit Card, UPI, or Net Banking) within 5 to 7 business days, depending on your bank\'s processing time.</p> </li> </ul> <p dir=\"ltr\">4. Late or Missing Refunds</p> <p dir=\"ltr\">If you haven’t received a refund within 7-10 days:</p> <ol> <li dir=\"ltr\" aria-level=\"1\"> <p dir=\"ltr\" role=\"presentation\">First, check your bank account again.</p> </li> <li dir=\"ltr\" aria-level=\"1\"> <p dir=\"ltr\" role=\"presentation\">Contact your credit card company or bank; it may take some time before your refund is officially posted.</p> </li> <li dir=\"ltr\" aria-level=\"1\"> <p dir=\"ltr\" role=\"presentation\">If you have done all of this and still have not received your refund, please contact us at info@robinfoodsindia.com.</p> </li> </ol> <p dir=\"ltr\">5. Contact Information</p> <p dir=\"ltr\">For any questions regarding refunds or cancellations, please contact us:</p> <ul> <li dir=\"ltr\" aria-level=\"1\"> <p dir=\"ltr\" role=\"presentation\">Brand: Robinfood (Arrikar Foods)</p> </li> <li dir=\"ltr\" aria-level=\"1\"> <p dir=\"ltr\" role=\"presentation\">Email: info@robinfoodsindia.com</p> </li> <li dir=\"ltr\" aria-level=\"1\"> <p dir=\"ltr\" role=\"presentation\">Website: <a href=\"https://www.robinfoodsindia.com\">www.robinfoodsindia.com</a></p> </li> <li dir=\"ltr\" aria-level=\"1\"> <p dir=\"ltr\" role=\"presentation\">Registered Address: [Insert Full Physical Address Here]</p> </li> <li dir=\"ltr\" aria-level=\"1\"> <p dir=\"ltr\" role=\"presentation\">Phone: [Insert Phone Number Here]</p> </li> </ul>', 1)

This Refund and Cancellation Policy outlines your rights and our procedures for such events.</p> <p dir=\"ltr\">1. Cancellation Policy</p> <ul> <li dir=\"ltr\" aria-level=\"1\"> <p dir=\"ltr\" role=\"presentation\">Before Shipment: You may cancel your order if it has not yet been dispatched from our warehouse. To cancel, please email us immediately at info@robinfoodsindia.com or call our customer care number. If the order is cancelled before shipment, a full refund will be initiated.</p> </li> <li dir=\"ltr\" aria-level=\"1\"> <p dir=\"ltr\" role=\"presentation\">After Shipment: Once the order has been dispatched/shipped, it cannot be cancelled.</p> </li> </ul> <p dir=\"ltr\">2. Please send an email to info@robinfoodsindia.com with:</p> <ol> <li dir=\"ltr\" aria-level=\"1\"> <p dir=\"ltr\" role=\"presentation\">Your Order ID.</p> </li> <li dir=\"ltr\" aria-level=\"1\"> <p dir=\"ltr\" role=\"presentation\">Clear photos/videos of the damaged or wrong product.</p> </li> <li dir=\"ltr\" aria-level=\"1\"> <p dir=\"ltr\" role=\"presentation\">A brief description of the issue.</p> </li> </ol> <p dir=\"ltr\">Note: We reserve the right to reject return claims if the issue is not reported within 48 hours of delivery.</p> <p dir=\"ltr\">3. Late or Missing Refunds</p> <p dir=\"ltr\">If you haven’t received a refund within 7-10 days:</p> <ol> <li dir=\"ltr\" aria-level=\"1\"> <p dir=\"ltr\" role=\"presentation\">First, check your bank account again.</p> </li> <li dir=\"ltr\" aria-level=\"1\"> <p dir=\"ltr\" role=\"presentation\">Contact your credit card company or bank; it may take some time before your refund is officially posted.</p> </li> <li dir=\"ltr\" aria-level=\"1\"> <p dir=\"ltr\" role=\"presentation\">If you have done all of this and still have not received your refund, please contact us at info@robinfoodsindia.com.</p> </li> </ol> <p dir=\"ltr\">5. Contact Information</p> <p dir=\"ltr\">For any questions regarding refunds or cancellations, please contact us:</p> <ul> <li dir=\"ltr\" aria-level=\"1\"> <p dir=\"ltr\" role=\"presentation\">Brand: Robinfood (Arrikar Foods)</p> </li> <li dir=\"ltr\" aria-level=\"1\"> <p dir=\"ltr\" role=\"presentation\">Email: info@robinfoodsindia.com</p> </li> <li dir=\"ltr\" aria-level=\"1\"> <p dir=\"ltr\" role=\"presentation\">Website: <a href=\"https://www.robinfoodsindia.com\">www.robinfoodsindia.com</a></p> </li> <li dir=\"ltr\" aria-level=\"1\"> <p dir=\"ltr\" role=\"presentation\">Registered Address: [Insert Full Physical Address Here]</p> </li> <li dir=\"ltr\" aria-level=\"1\"> <p dir=\"ltr\" role=\"presentation\">Phone: [Insert Phone Number Here]</p> </li> </ul>', 1)
